actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no deduction shall be allowed for expenses for advertising alcoholic beverages and tobacco products.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny an income tax deduction for any expenses paid or incurred to advertise alcoholic beverages or tobacco products.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no deduction shall be allowed for expenses for advertising alcoholic beverages and tobacco products.
